meanings.sent2: The skunk sprayed a smelly liquid.
meanings.sent3: The smelly cheese made everyone plug their noses.
meanings.sent4: The smelly socks in the locker room were like a cloud of stink.
meanings.sent5: The smelly fish market was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The bathroom was so smelly after someone forgot to flush.
meanings.sent2: The dumpster behind the restaurant was always smelly.
meanings.sent3: The smelly shoes by the door were a clear sign of a forgetful owner.
meanings.sent4: The smelly smoke from the bonfire lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The smelly perfume was overpowering in the small room.
